FollowPathRange.Description: The search radius when looking for a patrol path

PathShape.Description: The shape of the path the NPC should follow. 'Chain' will result in chained paths

ViewSegments.Description: The number of view segments when rotating at a path node

NodePauseScaleRange.Description: The range from which to pick to decide the fraction of the total pause time that will be spent looking in a given direction

NodePauseExtraPercentRange.Description: An additional random percentage to add to this pause time
